[{"id":"JT-49125","entityId":"25-2113936","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49125"},{"name":"summary","value":"Button Switch to Trial does nothing"},{"name":"description","value":"

After pressing the button the only thing happens, page reloads. But license is not switched to Trial.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1536670699270"},{"name":"updated","value":"1536840968468"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"alexander.buturlinov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Buturlinov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-926","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","fullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina"}]},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 75","id":"YouTrack:sprint 75"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-3062607","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-49125","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Leonid Stryuk does the REST endpoint already able to switch ?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536694412179,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3063095","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-49125","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Ekaterina Zaikina it should. But i think switching happens async. I.e. first i ask eshop to switch -> they generate license -> it triggers new licence event to Hmaster -> hmaster sends request to reload license to YT
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536743801458,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3063301","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-49125","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Can we show some kind of loader during this eshop <-> hmaster communications ? E.g. pulling for some flag from backend that we are waiting fir new license ?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536748539409,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3063927","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-49125","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Ekaterina Zaikina sure, i'll add a flag planUpgradeRequested in hostedPlan.
It will indicate that button was pressed, and it will update it's state as soon as YT got new license

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536759972109,"updated":1536759993945,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3063988","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-49125","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Also in case of failed update i will response with 400
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536761005929,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-49050","entityId":"25-2109841","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49050"},{"name":"summary","value":"Switching between "tabs" with Alt+Ctrl can make comments disappear"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  1. refresh the page
  2. press some tabs with Alt+Ctrl mouse click fast enough
  3. one tab will show changes from another (probably empty)

http://www.screencast.com/t/8lFOTI2d

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536222504042,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3056524","author":"rekolobov","authorFullName":"Roman Kolobov","issueId":"JT-49050","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Or the same happens when the backend responds slowly:

  • open any FSI with only comments on
  • suspend the app (Ctrl+Z, debugger, etc)
  • ctrl+alt+click on history, then ctrl+alt+click on comments
  • resume the app

AR: history is shown
ER: comments are shown

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536235778535,"updated":1536235839750,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3056529","author":"pavel.nikitin","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikitin","issueId":"JT-49050","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Roman Kolobov I guess it's either you have to be fast or the backend has to be slow :) If you manage to be faster, you got this reproduced :)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536583280357,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-48790","entityId":"25-2095640","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48790"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't add an Issue Distribution Report widget to a dashboard"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  • go to a dashboard on hub.jetbrains.com
  • add the widget
  • select YouTrack
  • select New Report
  • enter a name for the report (I used "TestReport")
  • select Hub as a project
  • click Save

AR:

  • An error "Cannot save report: Property FlatDistributionReport.name is invalid" is shown
  • The json of the POST request doesn't include required data
{"$type":"jetbrains.youtrack.reports.impl.distribution.flat.gap.FlatDistributionReport","name":"","projects":[],"xsortOrder":"COUNT_INDEX_DESC","xaxis":{"field":{"$type":"jetbrains.charisma.keyword.PredefinedFilterField","id":"project","presentation":"project"}},"query":"","own":true}

ER: widget configuration ends successfully
